description: We start with five potential trainees and four handlers. The day is filled with heavy exercise, humiliation, pain testing and orgasm control. The girls are pushed through basic exercise to get the juices flowing. We try to teach them basic protocol, yet some can't even get that right. I am trying to be positive about the situation, but at this rate I feel I may have to eliminate them all and start from scratch. The day comes to an end and we have gotten it down to two girls.The final two are given a little lesson in pain processing. Blindfolded, they have to choose an implement of torture and then the handler to use it on them. If these two want to make it, I will need to see a vast improvement from one of them.
title: Five Girl Intake
